title: Omnifood Project ðŸ¥™
text: Omnifood is part of the Build Real World Website course hosted on Udemy. This project focuses on design, responsive layout, performance and accessibility.

title: Libft ðŸ—“
text: 42 school's first project, libft, is about learning how the standard functions of C programming work, by coding them from scratch and creating our very own library.

title: Philosophers ðŸ“¯
text: This project is training in multi-thread and multi-process programming using mutexes and semaphores. It features three programs, each offering a twist on the classic Dining Philosophers problem while following the same basic rules.

title: Cub3D ðŸ“Œ
text: Cub3D is a 42 school team project to create a dynamic view inside a 3D maze. Using the MiniLibX library, we must implement raycasting in the style of the famous Wolfenstein 3D game, the first true FPS in videogame history.
